result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.html: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.

result.eng: Good day to you now. [to somebody who is leaving]
result.html: Lá maith anois agatGood day to you now. [to somebody who is leaving]
result.ponchtml: Lá maiṫ anois agatGood day to you now. [to somebody who is leaving]

result.eng: They say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ga: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.orig: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.html: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ponchtml: Deirtear go ḃfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gaċ grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.

result.html: Tá an drochshúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.
result.ponchtml: Tá an droċẛúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
